overview: Dr. Bethany Niell, MD, PhD is the Section Chief of Breast Imaging at H. Lee Moffitt Cancer Center in Tampa, Florida. She is a board-certified subspecialty-trained diagnostic radiologist who actively participates in a breast imaging clinical practice, as well as educational activities, and clinical research. Her clinical practice involves interpreting mammograms, ultrasound, breast MRI and performing image-guided breast biopsies. Dr. Niell’s major research interests focus on three main topics: 1) breast cancer risk stratification and supplemental screening in women at elevated risk of developing breast cancer; 2) radiomics (extraction of mineable data from medical images) within breast imaging; and 3) the appropriate utilization of breast imaging.
